pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. _readme:Description============This "Command and Query" module allows a developer to generate an abstraction aroundcalling commands and queries in a domain model.Getting started---------------:: # In your calling module from minty.cqrs import CQRS from minty.infrastructure import InfrastructureFactory from zsnl_domains import some_domain # Configure a CQRS instance (config file type may be ".conf" or ".json") infra_factory = InfrastructureFactory("/etc/configfile.conf") cqrs = CQRS([some_domain], infra_factory) # Params can also be pre-set by the command or query function: query_instance = cqrs.get_query_instance("some_domain", "context") query_instance.some_query()Contributing------------Please read `CONTRIBUTING.md <https://gitlab.com/minty-python/minty/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md>`_for details on our code of conduct, and the process for submitting pull requests to us.Versioning----------We use `SemVer <https://semver.org/>`_ for versioning.
